topic.title: recover old zeroid
topic.body:
hello there

some time ago i created a zeroid that i would like to recover. i still have the ZeroBundle as a backup and i think my zeroid should be saved there somewhere.

does anyone know how i can recover my zeroid?

thank you very much in advance

1550349876_1MYT6PZi9Ko9hML4pi4pszLC4zGYi.body:
> [r1pp3r](#comment_1_12kuPxC88GWRGtAd7XPn5bcn7bpuRzR3SV): You only need to replace "users.json" in your "data" subfolder. [...]

thanks
